name: SINGULARITY ⚫️
description:
WEB VERSION, FIXED NATIVE BUILDS AND DISCLAIMER:

Please play using these links instead. 😭 Unfortunately can't upload new files during voting, but I went to sleep before building for web so I wasn't able to upload that at all, and when I went to build it also noticed a few graphical issues that would have affected some native builds too, and fixed them, but I have not changed or extended the game itself in any way.

  • Web: http://ava.levelism.com/SINGULARITY/web/
  • macOS: http://ava.levelism.com/SINGULARITY/SINGULARITY_mac.zip
  • Linux: http://ava.levelism.com/SINGULARITY/SINGULARITY_linux.zip
  • Windows: http://ava.levelism.com/SINGULARITY/SINGULARITY_windows.zip

Issues fixed are:

  • A flipped Y axis on web made the black hole go in the wrong direction opposite to the camera.
  • RectMask2D didn't work on web so I had to change it to Image + Mask.
  • The depth buffer having a different range made me have to update the painterly shader to use LinearEyeDepth() on the value.
  • I had accidentally disabled the GameObject with the HUD in the editor. 😫 

SINGULARITY ⚫️ was made for 5 out of the 7 days of Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 by Ava Skoog and Chris Logsdon. It sees you a robot left alone on an immensely long spaceship in the grip of a black hole, stuck on repeat tending to a garden with the humans long gone.


Devlog start to finish:
https://twitter.com/avaskoog/status/1229825696714895360

A M 💜 Z I N G robot illustration:
https://twitter.com/Alixesque/status/1231405390073479168
